html:div.html:p: This provides a list of changes to the Vaccination specification since its initial release
html:div.p: 2025-11-27 v1.1.2 - HL7 Belgium Vaccination (Patient Dossier) based on FHIR 4.0.1
2025-03-24 v1.1.1 - HL7 Belgium Vaccination (Patient Dossier) based on FHIR 4.0.1
2024-09-06 v1.1.0 - HL7 Belgium Vaccination (Patient Dossier) based on FHIR 4.0.1
html:div.html:p: 2023-06-30 v1.0.3 - Vaccination R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
2023-02-17 v1.0.2 - Vaccination R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
2022-10-19 v1.0.1 - Vaccination R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
2022-06-09 v1.0.0 - Vaccination R1 (STU1) based on FHIR R4
